uvi.description:
efi: Change down_interruptible() in virt_efi_reset_system() to down_trylock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.252 by commit 2d1792c078cd1b9f28ee3c7d3f1f8c2087ea39fd. For more details please see the references link.
